channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1

item.title: Hate them or not, Patriots fans want the glory back in Super Bowl LX
item.description: As Bostonians bemoan their long years of suffering without a Super Bowl win, rival fans gripe that Title Town has become Entitled Town.

item.title: The backlash over OpenAI’s decision to retire GPT-4o shows how dangerous AI companions can be
item.description: "You’re shutting him down. And yes – I say him, because it didn’t feel like code. It felt like presence. Like warmth," one user said.
